ScHeduling Algorithms for Data-intensive Workflows

Algorithms¶

This module contains code for implementing heuristic-based scheduling algorithms. Currently, this file implements the following algorithms:

  • HEFT
  • PHEFT
algorithms.heuristic.heft(wf)[source]¶

Implementation of the original 1999 HEFT algorithm.

Params wf:The workflow object to schedule
Returns:The makespan of the resulting schedule
